SEARCH

Class LibrarianController

java.lang.Object
LibrarianController
public class LibrarianController extends Object
Controller class for the Librarian Dashboard. Handles borrowing and returning books/CDs and viewing library items.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller class. Sets up table columns, loads data, and configures row coloring based on status.

    • handleLogout

      private void handleLogout()
      Handles the logout action. Redirects to the login screen.

    • handleBorrowBook

      private void handleBorrowBook()
      Handles the borrowing process for a selected item. Checks if the item is available and updates its status.

    • handleReturnBook

      private void handleReturnBook()
      Handles the return process for a selected item. Updates the status to Available.

    • handleSearch

      void handleSearch()
      Filters the table based on the search keyword.

    • handleReload

      void handleReload()
      Reloads data from the file and refreshes the table.

    • loadMediaFromFile

      private void loadMediaFromFile()
      Loads media items from 'books.txt'. Parses lines to create Book or CD objects.

    • reloadBooks

      private void reloadBooks()
      Helper method to reload books.

    • setCurrentUsername

      public void setCurrentUsername(String username)
      Sets the current username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the librarian.

    • getUserMembership

      private String getUserMembership(String username)
      Helper to get user membership for fine calculation.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      Membership type (Silver/Gold).
